metadata.title: CVE-2023-40745 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: LibTIFF is vulnerable to an integer overflow. This flaw allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possiblyexecute an arbitrary code via a crafted tiff image, which triggers aheap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
